segments.text: Did you get the mail? So you saw my letter?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: It's not fair.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yeah.  I know.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I don't understand.  You've already done so much, I don't know why do you have to go back.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I don't know.  I put in that. request too. They didn't...
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I guess, you know, everybody has to make sacrifices.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I don't know, it's just not fair.  I think you've already made your sacrifice.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: There's people that have given more though, you know?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I just don't see how they can make you leave when you have a new baby - we have a new kid.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I know.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Then why is that fair?  Why--
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: There's babies over there, though, that need mothers.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I don't know how you can be okay with this?  I don't know why you're not-- you're fine with it.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I'm not okay with it, but I don't-- it's not like I have a choice.  I don't see what crying about it is going to fix.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I'm just trying to think of another way.  I'm just trying to...
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Just, you know, kicking myself.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: like you sign up because you need money and
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: things just aren't what they seem.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: This is a stupid war.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: We're doing the right thing, though.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I know.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I just don't see why it has to be you.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: If not me then, who?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What am I going to do? Huh?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: You'll videotape everything, yeah?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Maybe you can send it to me, like stream it, yeah?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Don't you guys have access to computers over there.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Last month--  Yeah.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I just don't know how I'm going to do it without you.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I have to find sitters.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I can't raise a baby by myself.  How?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: We've got friends, that's why we moved here, huh?  Because there is a day care down the street.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I know.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: And your mother is close by.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I'll send you lots of letters.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: And I want lots and lots and lots of pictures.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: It's just not fair.
segments.speaker: M
